sentences.en: a list of all the files and folders on your hard disk
sentences.cn: 你硬盘上全部文件及文件夹的列表

sentences.en: Do you have an application on file with us?
sentences.cn: 你向我们提出的申请书有案可查 吗 ?

sentences.en: He turned the pages of a file in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他翻阅面前的文件。

sentences.en: His fingerprints were on file in Washington.
sentences.cn: 他的指纹已在华盛顿记录在档。

sentences.en: I looked your address up in the personnel file.
sentences.cn: 我在人事档案里找到了你的地址。

sentences.en: I made a bit of a boob throwing that file away.
sentences.cn: 我犯了个愚蠢的错误，把那份文件扔掉了。

sentences.en: I'll ask the secretary to file these letters away.
sentences.cn: 我让秘书把这些信件归档.

sentences.en: She pulled a blue file from the shelf.
sentences.cn: 她从架子上拉出一个蓝色文件夹。

sentences.en: Substantial numbers of rank and file members ignored their union's advice.
sentences.cn: 有相当一部分普通员工不理睬工会的建议。

sentences.en: The contracts are filed alphabetically .
sentences.cn: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

sentences.en: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.cn: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

sentences.en: The door won't fit ; you'll have to file it down.
sentences.cn: 这门关不上, 你得把它锉一锉.

sentences.en: the engine numbers were filed away.
sentences.cn: 发动机号码被锉掉了。

sentences.en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentences.en: The file on this man has been telexed to Paris.
sentences.cn: 这个人的档案已被电传到巴黎.

sentences.en: The officer left the scene without filing a report.
sentences.cn: 警察没有提交报告就离开了现场。

sentences.en: The payment offered to the rank and file is extremely poor.
sentences.cn: 列兵的待遇极低.

sentences.en: the rank and file of the workforce
sentences.cn: 普通劳动者

sentences.en: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.
sentences.cn: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

sentences.en: Today is the deadline for Americans to file their tax returns .
sentences.cn: 今天是美国人递交纳税申报单的截止日。

sentences.en: We were walking in single file to the lake.
sentences.cn: 我们正排成一列朝湖边走去。

sentences.en: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.cn: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.en: We will keep your résumé on file.
sentences.cn: 我们将把你的简历存入档案

sentences.en: We'll keep your details on file.
sentences.cn: 我们会把有关你的详细信息记录在档。

words.tran_cn: 锉磨工人；文件编档员；文件装钉员

phrases.tran_cn: 文件传输；经由网路将档案由一电脑复制至另一台电脑
存档：为了便于查考在或好象是在档案中
打开文件；开启档案；非机密档案

trans.tran_en: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject

trans.tran_cn: 锉，锉刀；文件夹；归档；纵列
trans.tran_en: a box or piece of folded card in which you store loose papers

trans.tran_cn: 把......归档，，（尤指在法庭）提起（诉讼），发送（报道），排成纵队行进，锉平；锉光滑；锉去
trans.tran_en: to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

trans.tran_cn: 提出申请； 排成纵队行进
trans.tran_en: to give a document to a court or other organization so that it can be officially recorded and dealt with

trans.tran_cn: 把归档；把…登记备案；提出
trans.tran_en: to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily
